channel.title: America Sucks
channel.description:
Well since America is now ruled by a nigger, i have decided to pack up and move to another country. Where should i go to escape the nigra overlord?
[b]I have ruled out:[/b]
[s]Africa.[/s] [s]Anywhere Hasumon lives.[/s]
[b]Hopefuls:[/b]
UK..

item.title: America Sucks
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

America sucked longed before it was run by a nigger.

/End

item.title: America Sucks
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:23, topic:241767”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=318134.msg2523360#msg2523360 date=1226038965]

Worx, you are one racist bastard. I have to say.

It’s Americas own fault that theire country is full off black people, first you take them as slaves, then you want them out.
The black people worked hard in your so-called country, so don’t jugde people by theire skin, you asshole.

So it’s alright for blacks to mock white people, rape white woman, bash white people?

Did I say that?

I just mean you are supposed to respect black people as much as you respect others. People are people.

I’ll respect who I wish to respect, those who have not earned my respect do not just get it because they’re a different colour to me.

Just swallow your pride man, seriously.

I would choke if I did :o

But let me ask you one question then, would you respect a white man that never earned it?
Would you respect a black man that earned it?

Also, what you just said made me lol.

I wouldn’t respect a white man if he hadn’t earned it, too me respect means a bit and I’m not going to respect, or hate in the same way, if you’re a different skin colour than me.
[/quote]
So basicly what youre saying is that noone gets respect before earned? Fair enough.

Well, I respect all people as indevidual beings, and what they think. But I might not agree to all of that.[/quote]
I acknowledge the fact that they are a fellow mammal and deserve a fair go at life. Until I’ve actually met you and shook your hand, you aren’t much to me other than a fellow human being, and I won’t hate or like you, you’re nuetral - respect, it is given out because someone has a different coloured skin, wrong. Respect should be earned.

Respect is earned, acknowledgment is granted.

Read full topic
